definition: to watch (a TV program)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: I watched Cla room on the Air on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我收看電視中的“空中課堂”。

sentences.english: Hello, and welcome to the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，歡迎收看《人性》節目。

sentences.english: Watch the FFI video below to see and hear the cao vit gibbon.
sentences.chinese: 收看下面FFI關於東部黑冠長臂猿的視頻。

sentences.english: Welcome to Da Ai Headlines. I'm Leeway Cai. Thank you for joining us.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎收看大愛英語新聞，我是蔡力薇，感恩您的加入。

sentences.english: I tune in to the film channal every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚都收看電影頻道。

sentences.english: And thank you for joining us here in the Inner Core.
Until the next time, we look forward to see you here on the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 我們期待下期“人性”節目你們能繼續收看。

sentences.english: I learned my subjects from Classroom on the Air on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我通過收看電視中的“空中課堂”學習。

sentences.english: Thank you for joining CCTV'S Around The World show.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你收看電視臺的世界之窗節目。

sentences.english: I remember watching the scissoring competition.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得收看該剪裁的競爭。

sentences.english: But fewer than one in three American households with televisions tuned in to the speech.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻有不足三分之一的美國家庭在收看他的演說。

sentences.english: I learned my subjects from Cla room on the Air on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我通過收看電視中的“空中課堂”學習。

sentences.english: She disapproved of her son's indiscriminate television viewing.
sentences.chinese: 她不贊成兒子不加選擇地收看電視。

sentences.english: Paul Raushenbush and my name is Paul Raushenbush, and this is all for now from the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 我是主持人，感謝您收看人性講堂。

definition: to listen to (a radio broadcast)
to watch/to view
subscription/to subscribe to
lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
please (do sth) (deferential form)
on-the-spot live broadcast
webcast/to request item for broadcast on radio program/dibble seeding/spot seeding
to replay/to rerun/(agriculture) to reseed/to oversow
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
video program
to welcome/welcome
live relay/broadcast of actual scene/to broadcast live
to announce/to read (the news)
to broadcast/to transmit
